name: Dr. Sarah Chen
subject: Data Structures
reviews: Best CS prof I've ever had. Makes complex topics feel simple.
Very approachable during office hours. Highly recommend!

name: Prof. James Holloway
subject: Linear Algebra
reviews: Brilliant professor but lectures move incredibly fast.
Know your stuff before walking in. No hand-holding.

name: Dr. Maya Patel
subject: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy
reviews: Literally changed how I think. Incredible educator.
So passionate about the subject. It's infectious!

name: Prof. Robert Kim
subject: Quantum Mechanics
reviews: The hardest class I've taken but I learned so much.
Not for the faint of heart. Absolutely brilliant though.

name: Dr. Lisa Thompson
subject: Creative Writing
reviews: She genuinely cares about your growth as a writer.
Best elective I ever took. Highly recommend to everyone.

name: Prof. Ahmed Hassan
subject: Thermodynamics
reviews: Very demanding. Expect to spend 10+ hours per week on homework.
Not the most engaging lecturer but knows the material cold.

name: Dr. Elena Rodriguez
subject: Molecular Biology
reviews: Her passion for research is contagious. Great mentor.
Tough but fair. You will learn a lot in her class.

name: Prof. Daniel Park
subject: World History
reviews: Makes history come alive. Never a dull moment in class.
I didn't expect to love this class but here we are.

name: Dr. Priya Nair
subject: Machine Learning
reviews: Pushes you hard but prepares you for real world ML work.
Her projects are intense but your portfolio will thank you.

name: Prof. Marcus Webb
subject: Ethics & Society
reviews: This class will change how you see the world. Seriously.
Super chill class with incredibly deep discussions.

name: Dr. Yuki Tanaka
subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews: Orgo is hard no matter what but she makes it manageable.
Study groups are essential. Don't try to do this alone.

name: Prof. Carlos Mendez
subject: Entrepreneurship
reviews: He's built 3 startups. Every class feels like a masterclass.
The most valuable course of my MBA. Period.

name: Dr. Fiona Walsh
subject: Social Inequality
reviews: Dense readings but she makes them worth it in discussion.
Will challenge your worldview in the best possible way.

name: Prof. Nathan Brooks
subject: Macroeconomics
reviews: Solid professor. Not flashy but very thorough.
Goes straight from the textbook. Come prepared to take notes.

name: Dr. Amara Okonkwo
subject: Neuroscience
reviews: One of the leading researchers in her field. Lucky to learn from her.
Demanding but an incredible mentor for grad students.
